verses.verse: Now the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> had <S%H1961><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> great <S%H6099><s%> multitude <S%H7227><s%> of cattle: <S%H4735><s%> and when they saw <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> that, behold, <S%H2009><s%> the place <S%H4725><s%> was a place <S%H4725><s%> for cattle; <S%H4735><s%>

The children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> and to Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and to the princes <S%H5387><s%> of the congregation, <S%H5712><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> and Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and Jazer, <S%H3270><s%> and Nimrah, <S%H5247><s%> and Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> and Shebam, <S%H7643><s%> and Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and Beon, <S%H1194><s%>

Even the country <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the congregation <S%H5712><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> is a land <S%H776><s%> for cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and your servants <S%H5650><s%> have cattle: <S%H4735><s%>

Why, said <S%H559><s%> they, if <S%H518><s%> we have found <S%H4672><s%> grace <S%H2580><s%> in your sight, <S%H5869><s%> let this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> be given <S%H5414><s%> to your servants <S%H5650><s%> for a possession, <S%H272><s%> and bring <S%H5674><s%> us not over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan. <S%H3383><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> Shall your brothers <S%H251><s%> go <S%H935><s%> to war, <S%H4421><s%> and shall you sit <S%H3427><s%> here? <S%H6311><s%>

And why <S%H4100><s%> discourage <S%H5106><s%> you the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> from going <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> them?
Thus <S%H3541><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> your fathers, <S%H1><s%> when I sent <S%H7971><s%> them from Kadeshbarnea <S%H6947><s%> to see <S%H7200><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

For when they went <S%H5927><s%> up to the valley <S%H5158><s%> of Eshcol, <S%H812><s%> and saw <S%H7200><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> they discouraged <S%H5106><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that they should not go <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had given <S%H5414><s%> them.
And the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled <S%H2734><s%> the same <S%H1931><s%> time, <S%H3117><s%> and he swore, <S%H7650><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%>

Surely <S%H518><s%> none of the men <S%H582><s%> that came <S%H5927><s%> up out of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> from twenty <S%H6242><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%> and upward, <S%H4605><s%> shall see <S%H7200><s%> the land <S%H127><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I swore <S%H7650><s%> to Abraham, <S%H85><s%> to Isaac, <S%H3327><s%> and to Jacob; <S%H3290><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have not wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> me:

Save <S%H3588><s%> <S%H518><s%> Caleb <S%H3612><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jephunneh <S%H3312><s%> the Kenezite, <S%H7074><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun: <S%H5126><s%> for they have wholly <S%H4390><s%> followed <S%H310><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

And the LORD's <S%H3068><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> was kindled against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and he made them wander <S%H5128><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> forty <S%H705><s%> years, <S%H8141><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the generation, <S%H1755><s%> that had done <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> was consumed. <S%H8552><s%>

And, behold, <S%H2009><s%> you are risen <S%H6965><s%> up in your fathers' <S%H1><s%> stead, <S%H8478><s%> an increase <S%H8635><s%> of sinful <S%H2400><s%> men, <S%H582><s%> to augment <S%H5595><s%> yet <S%H5750><s%> the fierce <S%H2740><s%> anger <S%H639><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> toward <S%H413><s%> Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

For if you turn <S%H7725><s%> away from after <S%H310><s%> him, he will yet <S%H5750><s%> again <S%H3254><s%> leave <S%H5117><s%> them in the wilderness; <S%H4057><s%> and you shall destroy <S%H7843><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people. <S%H5971><s%>

And they came <S%H5066><s%> near <S%H5066><s%> to him, and said, <S%H559><s%> We will build <S%H1129><s%> sheepfolds <S%H1488><s%> <S%H6629><s%> here <S%H6311><s%> for our cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and cities <S%H5892><s%> for our little <S%H2945><s%> ones:

But we ourselves <S%H587><s%> will go ready <S%H2363><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> we have brought <S%H935><s%> them to their place: <S%H4725><s%> and our little <S%H2945><s%> ones shall dwell <S%H3427><s%> in the fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities <S%H5892><s%> because <S%H6440><s%> of the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land. <S%H776><s%>

We will not return <S%H7725><s%> to our houses, <S%H1004><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> have inherited <S%H5157><s%> every man <S%H376><s%> his inheritance. <S%H5159><s%>

For we will not inherit <S%H5157><s%> with them on <S%H5921><s%> yonder <S%H5676><s%> side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> or forward; <S%H1973><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> is fallen <S%H935><s%> to us on <S%H5921><s%> this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> eastward. <S%H4217><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, If <S%H518><s%> you will do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing, <S%H1697><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you will go armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to war, <S%H4421><s%>

And will go <S%H5674><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> of you armed <S%H2502><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> he has driven <S%H3423><s%> out his enemies <S%H341><s%> from before <S%H6440><s%> him,

And the land <S%H776><s%> be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> then afterward <S%H310><s%> you shall return, <S%H7725><s%> and be guiltless <S%H5355><s%> before the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and before Israel; <S%H3478><s%> and this <S%H2063><s%> land <S%H776><s%> shall be your possession <S%H272><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> you will not do <S%H6213><s%> so, <S%H3651><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> you have sinned <S%H2398><s%> against the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and be sure <S%H3045><s%> your sin <S%H2403><s%> will find <S%H4672><s%> you out.

Build <S%H1129><s%> you cities <S%H5892><s%> for your little <S%H2945><s%> ones, and folds <S%H1448><s%> for your sheep; <S%H6792><s%> and do <S%H6213><s%> that which has proceeded <S%H3318><s%> out of your mouth. <S%H6310><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> spoke <S%H559><s%> to Moses, <S%H4872><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Your servants <S%H5650><s%> will do <S%H6213><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> commands. <S%H6680><s%>

Our little <S%H2945><s%> ones, our wives, <S%H802><s%> our flocks, <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> our cattle, <S%H929><s%> shall be there <S%H8033><s%> in the cities <S%H5892><s%> of Gilead: <S%H1568><s%>

But your servants <S%H5650><s%> will pass <S%H5674><s%> over, <S%H5674><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> man armed <S%H2502><s%> for war, <S%H6635><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> as my lord <S%H113><s%> said. <S%H1696><s%>

So concerning them Moses <S%H4872><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> Eleazar <S%H499><s%> the priest, <S%H3548><s%> and Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> and the chief <S%H7218><s%> fathers <S%H1><s%> of the tribes <S%H4294><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them, If <S%H518><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> will pass <S%H5674><s%> with you over <S%H5674><s%> Jordan, <S%H3383><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> man armed <S%H2502><s%> to battle, <S%H4421><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> and the land <S%H776><s%> shall be subdued <S%H3533><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> you; then you shall give <S%H5414><s%> them the land <S%H776><s%> of Gilead <S%H1568><s%> for a possession: <S%H272><s%>

But if <S%H518><s%> they will not pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> with you armed, <S%H2502><s%> they shall have <S%H270><s%> possessions <S%H270><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> you in the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan. <S%H3667><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> and the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> As the LORD <S%H3068><s%> has said <S%H1696><s%> to your servants, <S%H5650><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> will we do. <S%H6213><s%>

We will pass <S%H5674><s%> over <S%H5674><s%> armed <S%H2502><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> into the land <S%H776><s%> of Canaan, <S%H3667><s%> that the possession <S%H272><s%> of our inheritance <S%H5159><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> this side <S%H5676><s%> Jordan <S%H3383><s%> may be ours.

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> to them, even to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad, <S%H1410><s%> and to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben, <S%H7205><s%> and to half <S%H2677><s%> the tribe <S%H7626><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Joseph, <S%H3130><s%> the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Sihon <S%H5511><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of the Amorites, <S%H567><s%> and the kingdom <S%H4467><s%> of Og <S%H5747><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Bashan, <S%H1316><s%> the land, <S%H776><s%> with the cities <S%H5892><s%> thereof in the coasts, <S%H1367><s%> even the cities <S%H5892><s%> of the country <S%H776><s%> round <S%H5439><s%> about.
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Gad <S%H1410><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Dibon, <S%H1769><s%> and Ataroth, <S%H5852><s%> and Aroer, <S%H6177><s%>
And Atroth, <S%H5855><s%> Shophan, <S%H5855><s%> and Jaazer, <S%H3270><s%> and Jogbehah, <S%H3011><s%>
And Bethnimrah, <S%H1039><s%> and Bethharan, <S%H1028><s%> fenced <S%H4013><s%> cities: <S%H5892><s%> and folds <S%H1448><s%> for sheep. <S%H6629><s%>
And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Reuben <S%H7205><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> Heshbon, <S%H2809><s%> and Elealeh, <S%H500><s%> and Kirjathaim, <S%H7156><s%>

And Nebo, <S%H5015><s%> and Baalmeon, <S%H1186><s%> (their names <S%H8034><s%> being changed, <S%H5437><s%>) and Shibmah: <S%H7643><s%> and gave <S%H7121><s%> other names <S%H8034><s%> to the cities <S%H5892><s%> which <S%H834><s%> they built. <S%H1129><s%>

And the children <S%H1121><s%> of Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> to Gilead, <S%H1568><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> it, and dispossessed <S%H3423><s%> the Amorite <S%H567><s%> which <S%H834><s%> was in it.
And Moses <S%H4872><s%> gave <S%H5414><s%> Gilead <S%H1568><s%> to Machir <S%H4353><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh; <S%H4519><s%> and he dwelled <S%H3427><s%> therein.

And Jair <S%H2971><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Manasseh <S%H4519><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> the small towns <S%H2333><s%> thereof, and called <S%H7121><s%> them Havothjair. <S%H2334><s%>

And Nobah <S%H5025><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> and took <S%H3920><s%> Kenath, <S%H7079><s%> and the villages <S%H1323><s%> thereof, and called <S%H7121><s%> it Nobah, <S%H5025><s%> after his own name. <S%H8034><s%>
